mapper.select: SELECT reservationIdx AS calculationIdx, reservePrice, discountPrice, payPrice, (CASE calculateStatus WHEN 0 THEN '정산 미완료' WHEN 1 THEN '정산 완료' WHEN 2 THEN '정산 등록' END) AS calculateStatus, createdAt, paymentTime FROM Reservations WHERE paymentTime >= #{startDay} AND paymentTime <= #{endDay} AND storeIdx = #{storeIdx} ORDER BY paymentTime DESC;
SELECT SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, #{calculationMonthDate}), amount, 0)) AS fee FROM Payment WHERE storeIdx = #{storeIdx};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PartnerPayment (partnerIdx, sales, fees, price, calculateDate) VALUES (#{partnerIdx}, #{sales}, #{fee}, #{price}, #{calculationMonthDate});
